special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Otherwordly Perception.
descriptions: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

special_abilities.name: Slippery.
descriptions: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
descriptions: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
* 5th level (2 slots): mass cure wounds, scrying

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scepter.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
